title: Font # 2 from 80's Audio manufacturer "Nakamichi" ('Dragon')
content:
80's Audio manufacturer Nackamichi also used a font on a couple of their product models which looked like this:   
 ![Nakamichi's Dragon-CT logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419203812im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/43012.jpg)   
   
Ignoring the fact that there's an outline variety present too; the "A" is obviously very distinctive as is the overall character squareness. The curved upwards-tapers on the the end strokes of the "G" and "T" are also noteworthy.   
   
Anyone reconise this one? or do you think that it might be a custom-face??   
   
cheers, and thank you for reading.
author: anonymous
